titles.title: Creating American Jobs Through Foreign Capital Investment Act
A bill to permanently reauthorize the EB-5 Regional Center Program.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1850-1851)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

committee.name: Committee on the Judiciary. (text of measure as introduced: CR S1851)

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Hearings held.

bill.summary: 3/17/2011--Introduced. Creating American Jobs Through Foreign Capital Investment Act - Amends the Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 1993 to make the EB-5 visa (alien investor) regional center program permanent.
